title: [Visual] Morgana's Legs
body:
Walking in some of {{champion:25}} Morgana's skin shows her legs, I had thought I took screenies of her other skins but yes, I'm sure this will get visually updated later when and if she gets a small VU, I hope {{champion:10}} Kayle comes First. But again, just thought I'd post and have you guys address the Graphics Bug! It's kind of an eyesore! Thank you so much! 

- Enchantress

replies.body: Eeep! Nice catch! Looks like this is occurring on several skins and the base. We'll take a look and see what's happening here.
Why would they give Kayle another VU when Morg hasn't gotten an official one yet...

> [{quoted}](name=Nazzadan,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qvE7xfg7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-14T19:35:31.898+0000)
>
> Why would they give Kayle another VU when Morg hasn't gotten an official one yet...

True, But I just don't like how Kayle looks like a House Fly compared to some champions, She looks like if you gave her a hug she'd squash.
I really wish they would change the way the bottom of her dress looks entirely. She looks so so so dated and lumpy and bulky.
I know. They gave Twitch Legs, now it's time to give Morgana Legs and a better model!
